projects.name: IE11 Death Countdown
projects.description: Every Dev I know, absolutely hates IE11 and in an attempt to inspire, I decided to create a countdown until inevitable end of support of IE11

projects.name: Don't press my buttons
projects.description: I love making buttons and I wanted an excuse to experiment with css variables, so I made this.

projects.name: y portfolio website (Wow, so meta)
projects.description: When making this website I didn't want to go back to basics and challenge my self by making a great website without using any of the bells and whistles that I'm used to. That's why I only used plain old HTML(5), CSS(3) and Javascript(ES6). No Javascript framework or CSS preprocessor(SASS). More on that journey here
